goal.en: "Structural Geology is concerned with the deformation of rocks in the Earth‘s lithosphere. It integrates topics concerning deformation at all scales of observation, and emphasizes the linkages between structural geology and tectonics. The objective of this course is to provide students with varying core ability which include: 1. To recognize and differentiate between primary and secondary structures. 2. Understand the relationship between stress and deformed structures, and capable of analyzing kinematics and geometry of the deformed body. 3. Interpretation of fabrics of the deformed structures and the causing environmental factors."
goal.ch: "構造地質學是地質學門中的基本學科之一，主要研究組成地殼的岩石、岩層和岩體在受力變形後形成的各種構造，岩石受力變形時其組成及（或）結構發生改變。構造地質學研究的是結構方面的變化，這些包括構造的三維幾何形態、組合形式、形成的機制及其演化的過程。並探討形成這些構造作用力的方向、大小和性質。構造地質研究(地質方面)培養學生以下的核心能力 1. 辨認及解釋次生構造的種類及成因 2. 解釋次生構造的成因與應力之間的關係及幾何和運動學分析的能力 3. 辨識次生構造的組構(含主要礦物的辨識)及組構與形成當時的環境(外在)因子的關係"

content.en: " Joints  Faults  Folds  Fault-related interactions  Foliation and Lineation  Shear Zones and Progressive Deformation  Active Tectonics"
